summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Articard Security Shift Management System. Both backend APIs and frontend UI are fully functional with Estonian language support.

minor_issues.issue: React console warning about displayMonth prop case sensitivity

passed_tests: Backend API - Root endpoint (200 OK)
Backend API - Create shift (200 OK)
Backend API - Get all shifts (200 OK)
Backend API - Get shift by ID (200 OK)
Backend API - Update shift (200 OK)
Backend API - Add general incident (200 OK)
Backend API - Add theft incident (200 OK)
Backend API - Remove incident (200 OK)
Backend API - Get shifts by month (200 OK)
Backend API - Error handling for non-existent shift (404)
Frontend UI - Dashboard loading with Estonian language
Frontend UI - Statistics cards display
Frontend UI - Calendar functionality and navigation
Frontend UI - Shift creation form with validation
Frontend UI - Shift detail view and incident management
Frontend UI - Monthly report generation and display
Frontend UI - Responsive design (desktop, tablet, mobile)
Frontend UI - Print functionality
Frontend UI - Navigation between pages
Frontend UI - Form validation and error handling
action_item_for_E1: System is production-ready. Optional: Fix React displayMonth prop warning in calendar component for cleaner console output.
